text: Li Lu (; born 18 February 1992 in Panzhihua, Sichuan) is a Chinese slalom canoeist who competed at the international level from 2009 to 2016. She finished in 13th place in the K1 event at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.the result in 2016 Rio Olympics, also see Sina.com (2016-08-12) and QQ.com (2016-08-12) ==World Cup individual podiums== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;" !Season !Date !Venue !Position !Event |- | 2014 || align=right| 8 Jun 2014 ||align=left| Lee Valley || bgcolor=gold|1st || K1 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Lu LI at CanoeSlalom.net Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Panzhihua Category:Sportspeople from Sichuan Category:Chinese female canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of China Category:Canoeists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Canoeists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for China
title: Li Lu (canoeist)
